snippet.title: Hellsweeper VR Alpha Trailer (Upcoming Game in 2022)
snippet.description:
Note: The game is still under production. The video showcases pre-alpha assets and gameplay footage which might not reflect the final product. Wishlist HellsweeperVR on steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1341490/Hellsweeper_VR/
----
This is our upcoming VR game which will be launched in 2022.

Hellsweeper VR can be best described as a roguelike first person combat simulator. You play as an undead immortal who’s on a mission to take out the scumbags of Hell. You can traverse the different dimensions, yield weapons with deadly precision, command the forces of telekinesis and muster unseen powers to wipe out your enemies.

We will be launching a public alpha sometime in August 2021. Join our Discord Channel below to get informed when we release it.

----------------------------------
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1341490/Hellsweeper_VR/
Join us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/EYSbHnM
Official Website: https://www.mixedrealms.com/hellsweeper/
